title: Gift one-stop shopping this holiday season with a Costco Gold Star Membership that comes with a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card*
content:
Macworld

Christmas is less than one week away, and if you’re still scrounging for smart gift ideas, it may be too late to order a physical item and receive it on time. Fortunately, you can gift something digital, meaning there’s no shipping to worry about.

This holiday season, treat someone to a highly practical and thoughtful gift: a one-year Costco Gold Star Membership. Through December 25, it’s only $60 and even comes with a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card*.

With a Costco Gold Star Membership, you can shop at over 500 warehouses nationwide. Members can find a plethora of goods, including everyday groceries, electronics like Apple gear, household supplies, and even holiday treats and decor. You can even find name-brand products from Dyson, KitchenAid, LG, and more.

Members can even shop online via Costco.com to purchase select items like produce and daily essentials, which can arrive with two-day or same-day delivery, depending on location. In addition, a Costco Gold Star Membership nets users extra perks. Stop by the Costco Tire Center to get brand-name tires installed as you shop in-store, or make a quick trip to the Costco Gas station to refuel your car with gasoline after shopping.

Gift a loved one (or yourself!) to a membership that keeps on giving.

Through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific, grab a 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership and a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* for just $60. No coupon is required!

 

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership and A $40 Digital Costco Shop Card*

Only $60 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.

Services are provided to Costco members by third parties. 

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within 2 weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes, or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $60 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $60 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.

Accessories
